column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Wan says : " What 's this harmonic thing Vaatu was talking about ? "
#Text=Raava says : " Harmonic Convergence .
#Text=" Raava says : " About a year in your time .
#Text=" Wan says : " Then we better start training .
#Text=All right , I 'm ready to try air .
#Text=How 's this gon na work ?
#Text=" Raava says : " The only way for me to give you the other element is to pass through your body and combine our energies .
#Text=" Wan says : " Great .
#Text=So you 've done this before .
#Text=" Raava says : " No .
#Text=This has never even been attempted .
#Text=It is very dangerous .
#Text=" Wan says : " That 's what they said about living in the Spirit Wilds , and I survived that .
#Text=I 'm ready .
#Text=Give me the air .
#Text=It feels completely different .
#Text=If you and Vaatu have the same fight every ten thousand years , why has n't one of you destroyed the other ?
#Text=" Raava says : " He can not destroy light any more than I can destroy darkness .
#Text=One can not exist without the other .
#Text=Even if I defeat Vaatu in this encounter , darkness will grow inside me until he emerges again .
#Text=The same will hold true if Vaatu defeats me .
#Text=" Wan says : " That does n't sound so bad .
#Text=Even if Vaatu wins , you 'll come back .
#Text=" Raava says : " Yes , but you will probably not survive to see it .
#Text=Vaatu will destroy the world as you know it .
#Text=Darkness will cover the Earth for ten thousand years .
#Text=" Wan says : " If I 'm gon na help you battle Vaatu , then I should visit more lion turtles .
#Text=Why is there so much conflict between humans and spirits in the first place ?
#Text=" Raava says : " This physical world is where humans come from .
#Text=Spirits come from another realm .
#Text=At the north and south poles , the two realms intersect .
#Text=Over time , more and more spirits have drifted into this world .
#Text=Humans have been forced apart , settling on the lion turtles who protect them and losing touch with each other .
#Text=" Wan says : " Most people think they live in the only human city in the world .
#Text=" Raava says : " Most humans think only of themselves , no matter how many others are around .
#Text=" Wan says : " When you pass through me , I feel an incredible rush of power .
#Text=I feel like I 'm changing .
#Text=The more we practice , the stronger I become .
#Text=Smells like smoke .
#Text=" Raava says : " Humans are nearby .
#Text=" Wan says : " Let 's check it out .
#Text=" Settler says : " A spirit !
#Text=" Wan says : " Easy there , fellas .
#Text=We 're friendly .
#Text=" Jaya says : " I ca n't believe it .
#Text=Wan ?
#Text=" Wan says : " Jaya !
#Text=What are you doing out here ?
#Text=" Jaya says : " You inspired us .
#Text=Once we heard that you survived out in the wilds , we decided to try it too .
#Text=" Wan says : " Where 's Yao ?
#Text=Did he come with you ?
#Text=" Jaya says : " Yes , but sadly he did n't make it .
#Text=We ... we lost a lot of good men along the way .
#Text=So why were you protecting this spirit ?
#Text=" Wan says : " This is Raava .
#Text=Do n't worry .
#Text=She 's not like the dark spirits you 've probably run into .
#Text=" Jaya says : " Dark spirits ?
#Text=What 's the difference ?
#Text=We throw fire at any spirit we see around here .
#Text=Just like they attack any man .
#Text=" Raava says : " You have no idea what you 're doing .
#Text=You 're only making things worse .
#Text=" Settler says : " The spirits are coming back !
#Text=" Jaya says : " Let 's wipe 'em out this time !
#Text=We 'll burn down this whole forest if we have to !
#Text=" Wan says : " What happened to you ?
#Text=When did you become so violent ?
#Text=" Jaya says : " You showed me we could change the world if we just stopped being so afraid .
#Text=Now we 're doing it .
#Text=" Wan says : " This is n't what I had in mind .
#Text="
